snippet: The Italian Navy has rescued more than 1,000 migrants from boats trying to reach Europe in the past two days, Italian authorities said Friday.
abstract: Italian authorities say that over two-day period, navy has rescued more than 1,000 migrants from Middle East and Africa from boats trying to reach Europe.
lead_paragraph: The Italian Navy has rescued more than 1,000 migrants from boats trying to reach Europe in the past two days, Italian authorities said Friday.

headline.main: Italy: More Migrants Rescued at Sea
headline.print_headline: Italy: More Migrants Rescued at Sea
